question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off turn back go straight up to the ice cold bar take right go until the fountain take left go straight. up to the ensure advertisement turn right go straight until the center of the lake take left go straight. take left go through buildings move forward until the road near blue three stored building look around see the blue postbox land near that.]. At the initial position, you are asked to navigate according to a series of movement instructions. When you reach the current location, what is the Landmark Position to the blue three-story building?  
choose:  
A. I am on the right side of the blue three-story building.  
B. I am located above the blue three-story building.  
C. I am on the left side of the blue three-story building.  
D. I am located behind the blue three-story building.  
E. I am far away from the blue three-story building.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: The current view shows a wide landscape with several buildings in the distance, but there is no specific indication of a blue three-story building nearby. The agent appears to be at a considerable distance from any distinct building that matches this description, suggesting they are far away from the target landmark.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 35)]
Option: [E]
Reason: From the current location, the agent is far away from the blue three-story building. The video shows a wide view of the city, and the blue three-story building is not visible in the immediate vicinity.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: E; Reason: The current view shows a wide landscape with several buildings in the distance, but there is no specific indication of a blue three-story building nearby.
